author: Sreemoyee Chatterjee
title: SRK is fine, says hospital
text:
Sandalwood star Shivarajkumar, who was admitted to Mallya Hospital at around 11 am on Tuesday after he complained of chest and shoulder pain while working out in the morning, was declared fit by the doctor later in the day, said the Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of Mallya Hospital, Bengaluru.
READ: Kannada actor Shivarajkumar suffers heart attack
"He is fine now. He had mild discomfort and pain in the morning. After conducting angiogram and electrocardiogram (ECG), we have found out a minor chest dispute. He is under medication now and will be required to take rest for the next two days. There is nothing to worry. He is a fit and young 53-year-old actor and will be resuming work soon," said Indru Wadhwani, CEO and president of Mallya Hospital.
He added, "Tomorrow (Wednesday) he will be shifted to a deluxe room kept for VIPs in the hospital from Cardiac Care Unit (CCU) and will be released from the hospital in another two days."
His wife , Geetha Shivarajkumar, said: "We were on a holiday and he experienced a chest pain in the morning. When he was admitted, the doctors conducted angiogram and said that it might have happened due to stress. But there is nothing to panic about."
